attr.title: Loop Hero
attr.desc: The Lich has thrown the world into a timeless loop and plunged its inhabitants into never ending chaos. Wield an expanding deck of mystical cards to place enemies, buildings, and terrain along each unique expedition loop for the brave hero.
attr.inst:
Purchase Loop Hero on the Android Epic Games Store. Extract the APK, instructions in the portfolder! Copy the extracted APK to ports/loophero.
Run Loop Hero.
